parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Variables

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Tests whether the variable given by its name is [[nil]] or undefined, or whether the given expression evaluates to [[nil]] or [[Nothing]].
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>ofp</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part></template> This command doesn't exist in <template><title>ofp</title></template> but can be emulated (see '''[[#Examples|Example 5]]''').</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[isNil]] variableName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> variableName: [[String]] - name of a [[missionNamespace]] variable (e.g "someVar") or a local variable (e.g "_someVar")

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if variable is [[nil]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[isNil]] code

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> code: [[Code]] - code to evaluate:
* the code '''will''' be executed; <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>[[isNil]] { [[player]] [[setDamage]] 1; };</value></part></template> ''will'' kill the player
* the code will not be allowed [[canSuspend|to suspend]] while expression is evaluated, even if the parent scope allows it (see '''[[#Examples|Example 4]]''').

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if code returns something other than [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[isNil]] "pokus") [[then]] { pokus = 0; };</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[isNil]] { [[player]] [[getVariable]] "someVar" };</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_myArray = [0, 1];
[[isNil]] { _myArray [[select]] 0 }; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns [[false]]</value></part></template>
[[isNil]] { _myArray [[select]] 1 }; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns [[false]]</value></part></template>
[[isNil]] { _myArray [[select]] 2 }; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>returns [[true]]</value></part></template>
[[isNil]] { _myArray [[select]] 3 }; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>throws a script error. only length+1 select is allowed</value></part></template>
</code>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> You can do this trick to force execute something in [[Scheduler|Unscheduled Environment]].<code>[[spawn]] {
	[[systemChat]] [[str]] [[canSuspend]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>chat shows [[true]]</value></part></template>
	[[isNil]] {[[hint]] [[str]] [[canSuspend]]}; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>hint shows [[false]]</value></part></template>
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>x5</name>=<value> <template><title>ofp</title></template> workaround:<br>SQS syntax:
<code>_nil = [[format]] ["%1", _undefinedVariable]
? ([[format]] ["%1", foo] == _nil) : foo = "value"</code>
SQF syntax:
<code>_nil = [[format]] ["%1", _undefinedVariable];
[[if]] ([[format]] ["%1", foo] == _nil) [[then]] { foo = "value"; };</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[nil]], [[Variables]], [[Scheduler]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
